meaningMnemonic: This <radical>tree</radical> has an <radical>umbrella</radical>, which it's holding over its head. Strange, because trees normally like water… Turns out, this tree wasn't getting showered in water, but in dollar <kanji>bill</kanji>s instead.
readingMnemonic: And the person who gave the tree an umbrella to protect it from all those <kanji>bills</kanji>? <reading>Satsu</reading>ki (さつ), a little girl famous for… handing out umbrellas, I guess. Makes sense that Satsuki would take care of these bills then.
